name: The Club (itch) (Straski)
description:
Walk through The Club as you retrieve your friend's lost items, but be sure not to be seen by the thug your friend owes money to.

I was toying around with a concept for a horror game where you hear a scary noise when you're looking in the general direction of the enemy, regardless of whether or not the enemy is near you. I think the concept would work a lot better in a larger game with scarier graphics, but for this game jam I tried to adapt the idea into a bite sized experience as best as I could (and unfortunately, I'm the furthest thing from a visual artist).

This is my first game period and the first time I've done most things in this game, so I spent basically the whole time learning everything you see, but I learned a hell of a lot! I tried to take on an ambitious amount for a beginner because hey, you need a reason to push yourself to learn new things. I learned everything from how casting actually works, to how to use AI behavior trees. I'm afraid some of my design choices might make some of the things I learned go unnoticed, but it be like that. I'll do better next time.

I'm really glad I decided to participate, even if it didn't come out as well as I would have wanted. I didn't have a lot of time to have it play tested, and when it finally was, it was found to be a bit too easy. I've tried to bump the difficulty up, so hopefully people will lose at least once. :)
